body:
I'm assuming this is Windows PowerShell, which we don't 
support in this Github repository.  

Azure Issue! You need to post at the Azure PowerShell repository at: https://github.com/Azure/azure-powershell

Make sure to provide all the information required to help troubleshoot the issue with the correct PowerShell and Azure Module version.

On December 18th, the new Azure module was released:
Az Module version 1.0  - new AzureRM module (now called Az) available for both Windows PowerShell and PowerShell Core: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/azure-powershell-az-module-version-1/?utm_source=dlvr.it&utm_medium=linkedin

We encourage you to try this new module moving forward.

Instead of using the New-AzureRmWebAppSSLBinding, try using:
New-AzWebAppSSLBinding 

Then, log any issue found in the proper repository.

Thanks for your contribution!
